dataQuality: REAL - Extracted from reviews, website, and search

topProducts.name: Korean BBQ Ribs
quotes: I ordered the korean ribs, ribeye (omg, super weird to order a ribeye out loud being vegan for like 7 years
The food was fantastic, I didn't expect it to taste this great!
Korean ribs are a fan favorite. With a chewy & meaty texture inside, a brown sugar dry rub offers a crispy exterior
topProducts.description: Tender seitan Korean ribs packed with sweet and savory flavor. Grill, toss in salads, or make kabobs for a satisfying plant-based feast.
topProducts.ingredients: Vital wheat gluten, apple juice, water, soy sauce, brown sugar, chickpea flour, sesame seeds
cookingInstructions: Pan Fry: Medium heat until heated through
topProducts.whyPeopleLoveIt: Best-selling item, tender meaty texture, perfect sweet-savory balance, versatile for multiple cooking methods

topProducts.name: Pepperoni
quotes: Their cured 'meats' are their home run (imo) pepperoni/summer sausage etc
I picked up... pepperoni... and Cajun jerky
topProducts.whyPeopleLoveIt: Signature cured meat, perfect for pizza, great texture and flavor

topProducts.name: Italian Sausage
quotes: The Italian sausages snap with that perfect casing bite
topProducts.whyPeopleLoveIt: Perfect snap texture, ideal for grilling or pasta

topProducts.name: Pastrami
quotes: I picked up... some pastrami, a sriracha brat, pepperoni
topProducts.whyPeopleLoveIt: Authentic deli flavor, perfect for sandwiches

topProducts.name: Italian Cold Cut Sandwich
quotes: AMAZING, all of their hot sandwiches are yummy
topProducts.whyPeopleLoveIt: Grab-and-go option, house-made salami and provolone

topProducts.name: Aged Cheddar Cheese
topProducts.whyPeopleLoveIt: Sharp, crumbly, melts beautifully - made in-house with soy milk and coconut oil base

timingInsights.insight: Weekend mornings see lines out the door, but they move fast
